Package application

Class CustomizeController

java.lang.Object
application.CustomizeController
public class CustomizeController
extends java.lang.Object
The Customize Controller class will be used to create the user's pizza. Same UI for all pizza types.
Author:
Manav Bali, Daniel Lopez

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the UI to default settings for the user to customize.

    • set

      public void set()
      Sets up the UI pizza image based on what the user selects. Adds the toppings based on what pizza the user selected.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController​(MainController controller)
      Transfer the information from the Main Controller to this UI controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - from main menu.

    • addTop

      public void addTop()
      Adds the topping based on user selection. Subtotal of pizza is updated.

    • removeTop

      public void removeTop()
      removes the topping based on user selection. Subtotal of pizza is updated.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder()
      Once the user is finished creating their pizza the order for that user is recorded.
